paragraphs.content: A Song of degrees of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song of degrees of David.

paragraphs.content: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

paragraphs.content: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

paragraphs.content: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the Lord, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

paragraphs.content: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

paragraphs.content: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.

paragraphs.content: For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.

paragraphs.content: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because of the house of the Lord our God I will seek thy good.
